meanings.definition: A small, winged Cupid or cherub in art.
meanings.sent1: In the painting, an amorino was depicted flying above the lovers.
meanings.sent2: The sculpture featured an adorable amorino holding a bow and arrow.
meanings.sent3: The artist added a playful touch by including an amorino in the corner of the canvas.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was like a dream, with an amorino symbolizing love and desire.
meanings.sent5: The tiny amorino in the artwork seemed to bring the whole scene to life.

meanings.definition: A type of gelato dessert made to resemble a flower.
meanings.sent1: At the gelato shop, I ordered a delicious amorino with petals made of gelato.
meanings.sent2: The amorous couple shared an amorino dessert on their romantic date.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they enjoyed their colorful amorino treats.
meanings.sent4: The gelato artist skillfully crafted an amorino that looked almost too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of the amorino dessert filled the air, tempting everyone nearby.
